sen.j: 霊仙山（りょうぜんさん）は、滋賀県多賀町と米原市にまたがる、標高1,094mの山である。
sen.e: Mount Ryozen is a mountain between Taga-cho and Maibara City, Shiga Prefecture, with elevation of 1,094 m.
Mount Ryozen is a mountain between Taga-cho and Maibara City, Shiga Prefecture, with a peak elevation of 1,094 m.
sen.cmt: a peak を追加しました。
sen.e: Mount Ryozen is a mountain between Taga-cho and Maibara City, Shiga Prefecture, with a peak elevation of 1,094 m.

sen.j: 山頂は、多賀町に属する。
sen.e: The peak is located in Taga-cho town.
The peak is located in Taga-cho town.
The peak is located in Taga-cho town.

sen.j: 鈴鹿山脈の最北端に位置している。
sen.e: It is at the northmost end of the Suzuka Mountain Range.
It is at the northernmost end of the Suzuka Mountain Range.
It is at the northernmost end of the Suzuka Mountain Range.

sen.j: スキー場などの大規模開発がほとんど行われていないため、豊かな自然が残っている。
sen.e: Nature has been preserved largely untouched due to the absence of large-scale development, such as ski resorts.
Nature has been preserved largely untouched due to the absence of large-scale development, such as ski resorts.
Nature has been preserved largely untouched due to the absence of large-scale development, such as ski resorts.

sen.j: 山頂からは近江盆地と琵琶湖が一望できる。
sen.e: Panorama of Omi Basin and Lake Biwa can be viewed from the mountaintop.
Panorama of Omi Basin and Lake Biwa can be viewed from the mountaintop.
Panorama of Omi Basin and Lake Biwa can be viewed from the mountaintop.

sen.j: なだらかで登山道が整備され比較的登りやすいため、登山初心者をはじめ登山客に人気が高い。
sen.e: Due to its moderate slopes, it is a relatively easy mountain to hike and is a popular hiking destination for beginners, as well as other hikers.
Due to its moderate slopes, it is a relatively easy mountain to hike and is a popular hiking destination for beginners, as well as other hikers.
Due to its moderate slopes, it is a relatively easy mountain to hike and is a popular hiking destination for beginners, as well as other hikers.

sen.j: 春には西南尾根にフクジュソウ（福寿草）の群落が見られ、夏から秋には山頂一帯にトリカブトが多く咲く。
sen.e: "Fukuju-so" (Adonis ramosa) bloom in clusters in spring, and aconite flowers bloom in large numbers on the mountaintop from summer to autumn.
In spring, "Fukuju-so" (Adonis ramosa) bloom in clusters in the southwestern ridge, and aconite flowers bloom in large numbers on the mountaintop from summer to autumn.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れin the southwestern ridgeを補足しました。
sen.e: In spring, "Fukuju-so" (Adonis ramosa) bloom in clusters in the southwestern ridge, and aconite flowers bloom in large numbers on the mountaintop from summer to autumn.

sen.j: 夏場や湿度の高い時期にはヒル (動物)が多い地域があるため、事前の情報収集やヒル対策が必要である。
sen.e: Due to the large number of leeches found during summer and humid seasons, advance information-gathering and leech protection are necessary.
Due to the large number of leeches found during summer and humid seasons, advance information-gathering and leech protection are necessary.
Due to the large number of leeches found during summer and humid seasons, advance information-gathering and leech protection are necessary.
